game_description: Nanome - Your Home for Nanoscale Design Imagine a future where chemistry and the molecules are no longer difficult to understand. Nanome enables you to build your own molecular structures or explore the intricacies of a DNA strand or understand what medicine looks like at the molecular level. Features: •Import molecular structures from RCSB Protein Databank, Pubchem and Drugbank. •Manipulate molecular structures by literally reaching out and grabbing, rotating, or enlarging your molecule. •See Atoms, Residues, Chains, or Proteins as Stick, Wire, Ball & Stick, or Van der Waals. •Measure distance and angles between atoms. •Mutate amino acids and cycle through rotamer conformations. •Build with any element from the periodic table. •Minimization simulations. •Duplicate or Split any selected area of your structure to modify or export independently. •Private & public multi-user support including 2D mode In-app camera to capture and export images.
review_1: Won't let me make an account
review_2: This has to be one of my favorite VR apps, and I really want to use this as a teaching tool. I can't wait for the full release!
review_3: Didn't work with Quest 2. Kept getting stuck while loading.
review_4: Why can’t I find a price/way to buy when using quest 2? I click the buttons and they go nowhere.
review_5: Never thought designing and simulating molecules would be this easy!
